Interface IAssociation

Connection, LNConnection, SNConnection

Method Detail

getAppContext

ApplicationContext getAppContext()
Returns:
The application context of the association. Contains referencing and encryption mode

getAuthName

MechanismName getAuthName()
Returns:
The authentication mechanism of the association.

isConfirmedMode

boolean isConfirmedMode()

getXDlmsRequest

InitiateRequest getXDlmsRequest()
Returns:
The xDLMS Initiate Request of the association. Contains confirm mode

moveLowerLayer

ILowerLayer<java.lang.Object> moveLowerLayer()
Returns:
Retrieves the ILowerLayer form this association. The association is removed from the lower layer

setLowerLayer

void setLowerLayer(ILowerLayer<java.lang.Object> lowerLayer)
Registers the association with the ILowerLayer. Used in tandem with getLowerLayer()

hlsAuthentication

byte[] hlsAuthentication(byte[] processedChallenge,
                         long timeout)
                         throws java.io.IOException
Process step 3 and 4 of HIGH level security authentication

Parameters:
processedChallenge - Challenge of the server, processed with the pre-shared secret
timeout - Amount of milliseconds waited before the request is aborted
Returns:
The computed challenge from the remote server. Null if authentication failed
Throws:
java.io.IOException
